pr_title: Add initial support for Bionic LibC

timeline.message: Add initial support for Bionic LibC

timeline.author: vjovanov

timeline.message:
Add initial support for Bionic LibC


Fixed typo

timeline.bodyText:
We should explicitly state that this does actually download and link against bionic libraries yet, but is used as a workaround to be able to do so externally.
We can change it to: "When set to true, sets the internally used libc to Bionic. Note that this does not currently download and link against Bionic libc, but serves as a workaround that makes it possible externally."
timeline.author: gradinac
